original_title: Dream Theater: [1993] Live at The Limelight
overview: Metropolis Pt. 1: The Miracle and the Sleeper, A Fortune in Lies, Under a Glass Moon, Surrounded, The Ytse Jam (with drum solo), To Live Forever, Take the Time, Eve, Pull Me Under, Another Day, Another Hand / The Killing Hand, A Change of Seasons (original version),  Wait for Sleep, Learning to Live
title: Dream Theater: [1993] Live at The Limelight
